The gold 8-lights crystal ceiling light fixture  used high quality of K9 crystal and polished  brass lamp body, suitable for any place at your home, such as bedroom, kitchen, dining room,living room
We offer modern ceiling light,chandelier,pendant light fixture,wall lamp ,vanity light
OKES we are committed to providing customers with high-quality and fashionable lighting designers. The lamps displayed in the store provide a real and good lighting experience in terms of appearance and scenes. We provide a variety of ligts, including chandeliers, ceiling lamps, pendant lights, wall lights, night llights, solar lights, outdoor lights, crystal chandeliers, etc. to decorate your life.
The mission of OKES is to provide the public with fashion, high quality, the latest home ceiling lamp, chandelier, bathroom mirror headlamp, wall lamp and other lamps
OKES is committed to meeting your home lighting needs with upgraded technology and high quality materials
We love to provide modern and innovative lighting solutions for your life because we are very fond of combining ordinary products with new technologies
product.bullet_points:
• 【Gold chandeliers Design】:This semi flush mount ceiling chandelier light fixture combination of gold modern geometric metal and eight exquisite clear square K9 crystal lampshades,Showcasing a stylish and elegant appearance.The contrast between the gold metal and crystal lampshades blends modern and farmhouse classic elements,creating a unique and refined decorative effect that perfectly embodies modern style
• 【K9 Crystal Material】The 8 lampshades of the ceiling light are made of clear K9 crystal, the lamp body is made of high-quality polished brass, the cube crystal lampshade is matched with G9 bulbs (bulbs are not included), and the crystal chandeliers reflects the bright light effect and projects it to the ceiling, making your home Reveals a low-key and elegant atmosphere
• 【Chandeliers Application】The chandelier ceiling light is reflected through the clear crystals which is bright and charming, suitable for installation in various spaces such as ,bedroom, kitchen, stairway, dining room, living room, etc. A perfect choice for home ceiling decoration.
• 【Bulb Requirements】Compatible with incandescent, LED and halogen bulbs with G9 sockets(40W Max). Please note the bulb is not included; this light can be dimmable if you use a dimmable bulb and compatible dimmer switch (not included)
• 【Easy to Install】Package comes with All mounting hardware accessions and instruction for quick and easy installation. This ceiling light fixture is required 4* G9 bulb (Bulbs are Not included ), Try out different bulbs to create a plethora of different looks in your house
